title: Planner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Select 3 targets at night. The next night, your first target will visit your second target, then on the next, they will visit your third target

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your target will perform their ability on their targets
-Your target will visit your other two targets, even if they normally can’t
-Redirect immunity

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make an attacking role kill two good faction members with your ability
